'''''Minecraft: The Garden Awakens''''' is an extended play consisting of a remix of [[Infinite Amethyst]]<ref>{{tweet|jukiokallio|1864251690637000809|cat's out of the bag! i am THRILLED to be able to finally tell you that i made an official remix for @Minecraft, reimagining @kuraine's beatiful melodies ðŸŽ¶ðŸ’• find it on your fav streaming platform!}}</ref> and three variations of it. Unlike other songs released alongside ''[[Minecraft]]'' updates, these songs have not been added to the game. It released on December 3, 2024.
